content: Good and very practical for temporary notes. Has easy editing, scrolling, coloring directly from home screen. For long-term notes use those heavy-weight apps since this one has no way of transfer of notes to new device except of manual copy-pasting. But again, for short-lived quick editable notes this one is among the best I could see.
